summary: It is an abandoned refuge useful for intrepid travellers who need to hide of cold and rain. In it you will find everything you need to stay a period of time.
descriptionHtml:
[b][size=22][color=lime]Traveler's haven[/color][/size][/b]
ObliSan Team mod

[youtube]thoLeUFEBm4[/youtube]


[img]http://s20.postimg.org/mjeskwdfh/y28k.jpg[/img]

Are you tired of living in large luxurious mansions?
Do you want to live like an authentic Skyrim's son, in contact with nature?
This is your hut. It is an abandoned refuge useful for intrepid travellers who need to hide of cold and rain.
In it you will find everything you need to stay a period of time.
If you turn on the firewood, the chimney will give off smoke and food will be hot.
The lantern and the candles can be turned on or turned off.
You can sit or lie down on the bed.
You can sit down outside on the scaffolding and look up close the cascade.
All of the containers are safe.

Requirements: none

Where is it?
-in front of Honningbrew Meadery, near the stables of Whiterun.

Installation:
-With NMM or copy and paste the files in the Data folder of the Skyrim installation.

Credits:
- Bethesda for making Skyrim.
- Nexus for giving me the opportunity to publish.
- To you for your downloads and encouragement to continue creating.
- And my Team, a small group, which unites the same illusion, make it bigger, the ObliSan Team.

-My attention and thanks to Ilpinfas (Sanchez) for their help, advice,
tutorials, explanations and your time.
